fields.body:
Building content-driven Django sites with Tango is fast and easy.

News, blogs, photo galleries, video and more are included. And these aren't toy apps. They've powered national magazines and large newspaper sites. You can have everything you need to get a solid, extensible site up and running in minutes. 

If you're just learning Django, the code is clean, well-commented and easy to understand. And if you already have a stack of apps for your project, Tango won't try to take over.

###Why Tango?
Because building a content-driven web sites with Django should be easy. Because you should be be able to build a Django web site in minutes, and know everything will work. Because your content management system shouldn't take over your project and force you to build your project around their CMS.

Tango is the result of more than six years building content-driven Django sites, including sites for large publications. Like Django itself, it is designed to get a lot done, quickly and simply. Whether you just want a blog or your a professional on deadline, you need a content manager that helps you get things done.

###Batteries included
Tango includes everything you need for a content-driven site, including:

News, articles & announcements  
As many blogs as you want  
Photo galleries  
video support  
Robust contact forms to handle any interaction with your readers  
Out of-the-box responsive templates  
Solid typography   
and a whole lot more...
